message:
Another player in cross-platform mobile apps: NativeScript
Uses Javascript to build cross-platform mobile apps for Android, iOS, and Windows Phone
Open Source
from Telerik
http://blogs.telerik.com/blogs/14-06-12/announcing-nativescript---cross-platform-framework-for-building-native-mobile-applications
name: Announcing Telerik NativeScript - cross-platform framework for building native mobile applications
caption: blogs.telerik.com
description: Telerik NativeScript - cross-platform framework for building native mobile applications
